HomePage.title: Select Your Nearest Bnoon Clinic
HomePage.description: Bnoon brings advanced care closer to you — with trusted doctors, innovative technologies, and a commitment to compassionate, personalized care; dedicated to setting new benchmarks in fertility and women's health care.

al-ahsa.name: Bnoon – Al Ahsa
al-ahsa.address: Almoosa Specialist Hospital, North Tower, Floor 12

ServicesPage.title: What Are You Interested In?
ServicesPage.description: Select the reason for your appointment — the service that best fits your needs. From assessment to treatment, our team of consultants will guide you every step of the way with expert care and a personalized plan.

having-child.title: Having a Child
having-child.description: Start your parenthood journey with Bnoon to help you start or grow your family whether you're facing primary or secondary infertility, seeking family balancing, or exploring ART to prevent genetic conditions.

general-fertility.title: General Fertility Consultation
general-fertility.description: Expert consultation and evaluation of reproductive health to personalized treatments for women and men. Our specialists provide advanced, supportive care every step of the way.

fertility-preservation.title: Fertility Preservation
fertility-preservation.description: State-of-the-art fertility preservation solutions powered by advanced technology and comprehensive packages — helping you safeguard your reproductive health for the future.

pregnancy-followup.title: Gynecology and Maternity Services
pregnancy-followup.description: Comprehensive women's health and pregnancy care — from puberty to post-menopause. Our gynecologists offer personalized support, from prenatal and postnatal care to managing PCOS, endometriosis, menopause, and more.

male-andrology.title: Andrology and Male Problems
male-andrology.description: Specialized care for male infertility and urological conditions. Our expert andrologists diagnose and treat issues such as low sperm count, hormonal imbalance, and erectile dysfunction to support fertility and overall male reproductive health.

DoctorsPage.title: Select Your Doctor
DoctorsPage.description: Choose from our trusted team of experts — highly qualified, board-certified consultants dedicated to providing expert guidance, advanced treatments, and innovative, personalized care.

visitType.title: Select Visit Type
visitType.description: Choose how you'd like to have your consultation - whether visiting us at the clinic or remotely through a virtual consultation. Both options provide excellent care tailored to your needs.

clinic.title: Clinic Visit
clinic.description: Visit our clinic for an in-person consultation and comprehensive examination.

virtual.title: Virtual Visit
virtual.description: Consult with your doctor from the comfort of your home via video call.

noDoctorsFound.title: No doctors found
noDoctorsFound.description: No doctors match your current filter criteria. Try adjusting your availability filter.

SelectDateAndTimePage.title: Select Date & Time
SelectDateAndTimePage.description: Choose your preferred appointment date and time. Available slots are highlighted on the left.

messages.selectDateFirst: Please select a date first to view available time slots
messages.noAvailability: No availability on {date}. Please select a different date.

description.enterPhone: We'll send you a verification code to confirm your phone number. This helps us keep your account secure.
description.verifyPhone: We've sent a verification code to your phone number. Please enter the {otpLength}-digit code below.

labels.enterPhoneWithoutCode: Enter your phone number without the country code

messages.waitBeforeRequest: Please wait {time} before requesting a new code

errors.invalidPhoneNumber: Please enter a valid phone number
errors.invalidOTPCode: Please enter a valid {otpLength}-digit OTP code

VirtualVisitInfoPage.title: Personal Information
VirtualVisitInfoPage.description: Please provide your personal information to complete your visit booking. This information helps us provide you with the best possible care.

errors.fullNameMinLength: Full name must be at least 2 characters
errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.nationalIdStartWith1: National ID number must start with 1
errors.nationalIdDigitsOnly: National ID number must only contain digits
errors.nationalIdLength: National ID number must be 10 digits
errors.iqamaDigitsOnly: Iqama number must only contain digits

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.description: Your personal information is encrypted and stored securely. We only use this information to provide you with healthcare services and will never share it with third parties without your consent.

AppointmentConfirmationPage.title: Your Appointment is Confirmed!
AppointmentConfirmationPage.description: Your appointment has been successfully booked and confirmed. You will receive a confirmation email or SMS shortly with all the details.

nextSteps.title: What's Next?
nextSteps.confirmationMessage: You will receive a confirmation email or SMS with your appointment details.
nextSteps.virtualVisitMessage: For virtual visits, you'll receive a meeting link with the confirmation email.
nextSteps.inPersonVisitMessage: For in-person visits, please arrive 10 minutes early at the clinic location. Please bring your ID, passport copy and previous medical reports, if any.

ManageAppointmentsPage.title: Manage Your Appointment
ManageAppointmentsPage.description: View, reschedule, or cancel your appointments.

noAppointmentsFound.title: No Appointments Found
noAppointmentsFound.description: You don't have any appointments scheduled.

reschedule.title: Reschedule Appointment
reschedule.description: Choose your preferred date and time for this appointment.
reschedule.selectDateFirst: Please select a date first to view available time slots
reschedule.noAvailability: No availability on {date}. Please select a different date.

cancel.title: Cancel appointment?
cancel.description: Are you sure you want to cancel this appointment? This action cannot be undone.

InPersonAppointmentInfoPage.title: In-Person Visit Information
InPersonAppointmentInfoPage.description: Please provide your name to complete your in-person appointment booking. We'll use this information to prepare for your visit.

visitDetails.title: In-Person Visit Details
visitDetails.description: You'll receive a confirmation email. Please arrive 10 minutes before your scheduled appointment time.

errors.fullNameMinLength: Full name must be at least 2 characters
